channel.title: My digital journey
channel.description: Recent content on My digital journey

item.title: A new era
item.description: Hi, glad you can join me on my digital transformation journey. Iâ€™ve been in IT some 30+ years now, give or take. My specialty (I use that term loosely) is Microsoft infrastructure. In 2016, I saw the writing on wall at the PSConfEu 2016 conference. There Jeffery Snover talked about “digital transformation”. At that point I was looking to get started with cloud. I’ve always been a Microsoft afficionado, so Azure had my preference.
